Key Match Events: Oklahoma City Thunder had a 36-12 run in the first half en route to a 70-43 lead.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 39 points in 29 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks were booed multiple times in the first half of perhaps the low point of their season.
Mikal Bridges went 0-for-9 in the game.
Others: The Thunder used a big fourth quarter to win 117-107 last Friday and snap New York's nine-game winning streak.
The Knicks' fourth loss in five games began when the Thunder used a big fourth quarter to win last Friday.
